name: Cecelia
description:
Delve into the mysterious beauty of a daunting and surreal setting. Cecelia is an ephemeral, atmospheric adventure offering a captivating blend of first-person exploration, platforming, and leaning on an unlikely giant companion.

Waking up on the coast of a fantastical island laden with basalt columns, searing lava flows, and perilous cliffs, you find yourself stranded, left to unravel your presence and purpose. However, your journey is not one of solitude. You unearth a magical rock that awakens a colossal stone baby, whose origin is as mysterious as the island itself.

The giant’s size is both a challenge and an advantage, as you'll need to maneuver and use her immense stature to negotiate the challenging environment. But Cecelia is still learning, and she’ll need your help to survive the island’s hazards as well.

Each step and leap forward brings you closer to understanding the island’s secrets, and the entity within the distant, foreboding lighthouse. More than just a game, Cecelia is a journey of introspection, exploring trust and interdependence.
